# Project Title: Mensajeria

## Broker async example of use 

This app is based on a code example offer by Matr (http://matrproject.com/docs/eng/async-channels-eng/)

## Getting Started

These instructions will get you knowing the first steps to use or import this application.

### Prerequisites

* Install Matr Viewer
* Search & install application Mensajeria

### Using the project

The application receives data in the following JSON format:

{"msg":"Hola mundo","user":{"name":"anita"}}

Other formats or content types will not be readed by the application

## Contributing
